description: Kitāb al-Taṣrīf li-man ’ajiza ’an al-ta’līf (The Arrangement [of Medical Knowledge] for One Who is not able to Compile a Book for Himself)
title: Kitāb al-Taṣrīf li-man ’ajiza ’an al-ta’līf (The Arrangement [of Medical Knowledge] for One Who is not able to Compile a Book for Himself)
author: Abū Bakr Muḥammad ibn Zakarīyā’ al-Rāzī (d. 925?)
